message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to invest in this valuable item. I'm willing to offer it to you for $12000.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you see in this product. I would like to propose a price of $10000 for the product.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm not willing to go as low as $10000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $11500.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering my budget constraints, I would like to propose a price of $10750 for the product.
I understand your budget constraints, Bob, but I'm still not willing to go as low as $10750. I'm willing to make a slight adjustment and offer the product to you for $11250.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. Considering our previous discussions, I would like to propose a price of $11000 for the product.
I'm getting close to your offer, Bob, but I'm still not willing to go as low as $11000. I'm willing to make another adjustment and offer the product to you for $11200.
I appreciate your efforts to meet me halfway, Alice. Considering our negotiations so far, I would like to propose a price of $11100 for the product.
I'm getting close to your offer, Bob, but I'm still not willing to go as low as $11100. I'm willing to make another adjustment and offer the product to you for $11150.
I appreciate your continued negotiation efforts, Alice. Considering our discussions, I would like to propose a final price of $11125 for the product.
